intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Laslow, Peri... I must speak with you two.

intro.speaker: Laslow
intro.line: Yes, Lord Xander! I assume this is about Lord/Lady Corrin and his/her allies. Where will we be engaging the enemy?

intro.speaker: Peri
intro.line: Ooh, I can't wait for them to get here! When does the stabby party begin?!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: The two of you will remain here. This isn't your fight.

intro.speaker: Peri
intro.line: What?! But I wanna spill someone's blood! This is important!

intro.speaker: Laslow
intro.line: Are you concerned that we're not up to the task, milord?

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: No, that's not it at all. I have full faith in both of you, as ever. However, I must face Corrin in single combat. That is the only way to limit unnecessary casualties. Enough blood has been spilled. That's why I need you two to remain here. Help keep the Nohrian soldiers at bay.

intro.speaker: Laslow
intro.line: I see. But, milord... how do you know that Corrin will agree to your terms? I don't trust those Hoshido brigands one bit. We should be nearby... just in case.

intro.speaker: Peri
intro.line: I agree! That way I can pop out and kill anyone you need me to!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: I won't say this again. You are to stay behind in this room. Period.

intro.speaker: Peri
intro.line: Aww...

intro.speaker: Laslow
intro.line: But, Lord Xander...

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Look. I trust the two of you, more than you even know. That is why I'm asking you to help me in this way. We've fought valiantly together, and I will always cherish memories with you both.

intro.speaker: Laslow
intro.line: Why are you saying these things? This isn't goodbye...

intro.speaker: Peri
intro.line: Yeah...I don't like this.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: I'm afraid we're out of time. I must go.

intro.speaker: Peri
intro.line: Wait, Lord Xander...

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: No! You're not allowed to leave this room, is that clear?

intro.speaker: Laslow
intro.line: Yes, milord...

intro.speaker: Peri
intro.line: This isn't how it's supposed to be... What's going on, Laslow?

intro.speaker: Laslow
intro.line: I don't know. But we must follow Lord Xander's orders...

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: *huff* *huff* Are we almost there?

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Yes. Father's room is at the top of this tower.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Thank you. Perhaps we should rest for a moment before ascending. We've all been through a lot just to get here.

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: That is an excellent idea. But, sadly, it doesn't appear we'll get the chance.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Oh? Why's that?

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: Look who's waiting for us.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Xander...

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: You're here. At last. Now, once and for all.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Hello, Corrin. You've done well to make it this far.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: It's been a long journey... I was hoping I wouldn't have to face you like this, Brother.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: For all your trials, you're still so naive. Did you think I'd let anyone, even you, kill Father right in front of me? If you insist on toppling Nohr, you'll have to get through me first.

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Big Brother, please stop! Do you two really have to fight like this? Corrin is still our brother/sister, and all he/she wants is peace!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Elise?! What are you doing? Have you abandoned Nohr as well?

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: No, that's not it. I just want our family to go back to the way it was...

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: I see. Is that child's logic how you swayed Camilla and Leo? I'm afraid it won't work on me. As the Crown Prince of Nohr, I don't have the luxury of being so naive. There is nothing you can say to dissuade me from protecting Father and Nohr. I will stop Corrin, here and now. It is the only way.

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Xander, no!

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Hold fast, everyone. As long as no one from Nohr intervenes, neither shall we.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Don't worry — this isn't a trick. And I won't attack Corrin before he's/she's ready. You see? I am here without the support of my retainers or any soldiers. This is between you and me, little prince/princess. Now, let us begin.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: *sigh* Understood, Brother.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: There isn't much space here. Let's step over into the great hall.

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Wait!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Stand back, Elise. there's no need for you to see this.

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: But...

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: I told you not to move!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: I tried, Elise. But you knew all along that this might happen.

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: *sniff* I'm sorry, Corrin. I'm sorry I couldn't talk Xander out of this...

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: It's OK, Elise. I'm glad you came all the way here with us. And no matter what happens... Having you as my sister has been the best thing that ever happened to me.

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: No matter what happens... Please, don't say things like that!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: It's time for me to go now.

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: *sob* There's got to be something more I can do... I can't lose my family forever! I CAN'T!! I'm sorry, Xander, but I can't obey you this time... I won't just let Corrin and Xander kill each other!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: All right, Corrin. Time to settle this once and for all. I hope you've taken all of my training to heart. Don't hesitate like you always used to, do you understand? This isn't a mock battle, little brother/sister.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: I won't hesitate, as long as you promise not to go easy on me. I'm not the same person I used to be.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: I sure hope that's true. Otherwise this will be a sad, short fight. Haaah!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Leo wasn't kidding... Xander is stronger than I remember. But I can't afford to lose...

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: You're much stronger than before. I'm impressed. But I'm afraid it's still not enough.

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Corrin!

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: Gods, he/she's losing!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: *huff* *huff* LEAVE US! This is my fight with Xander...

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: What's wrong, Corrin? Is that really all you've got?

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Xander... Please... Try to understand... You...you've got so much power... Join me and use it in the service of justice! Together we could easily overthrow King Garon!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Justice is an illusion. When kingdoms and lives are at stake, there's no justice to be found anywhere! Don't you see that by now?!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: *cough* *cough* You're wrong... Justice does exist. It's not black and white like some believe, but it's there all the same. Open your eyes... Brother...

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Very well.  You will die fighting for your cause. I shall defend my homeland!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Elise!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Elise! Please! Speak to me!

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Xander... Your sword... Lay it down for me.

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: Nohr needs more from you. Not just your strength...  What we need...  is caring...and a warm hand...and tears.

intro.speaker: Elise
intro.line: That's the way. Try to be at peace.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: No... No, this can't be happening!! Elise! Wake up! You can't die like this...  NOOOOO!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: ... Get up, Corrin. Let's end this.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: *sob* How can you keep fighting like nothing's happened?! Elise just died in your arms trying to stop us from fighting. Yet you just want to pick right up where we left off?

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: I...I know. That's why this fight will be our last. Now, get up.  NOW!

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: All she wanted was peace and for us to be a family again... She hated seeing us fight...  Please, Big Brother!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Don't make me say it again. Draw your sword, Corrin.

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: NOW.

intro.speaker: Corrin
intro.line: Brother... ... Fine. As you wish. I guess...you're not the brother I remember, Xander.  Elise...I'm so sorry I couldn't save you. And it doesn’t look like I'll be able to make your last wish come true, either. But I can still end this war. I can still bring peace to our kingdoms.  Xander. You taught me to be brave. You taught me how to wield power. The time has come for me to show you what I've learned. If you have any last words, now's the time!

intro.speaker: Peri
intro.line: Lord Xander! Is everything OK?

intro.speaker: Laslow
intro.line: Is...is that Lady Elise? What happened to her?

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: I told you two to stay out of this! What are you doing here?

intro.speaker: Laslow
intro.line: Milord, we both had such a bad feeling about this whole thing... And we thought it better to risk punishment than regret inaction.

intro.speaker: Peri
intro.line: Besides, they must have double-crossed you! Which one of you did this to Lady Elise? I'll gut you!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: No, Elise was... *sigh* As I commanded before, stay out of this! That is an order!

intro.speaker: Peri
intro.line: No way! Like Laslow said, we don't care if you're mad. We want to make sure you don't get killed! So we brought some troops.

intro.speaker: Laslow
intro.line: Against your orders if necessary... we will protect you, milord. Nothing will change our minds on this.

intro.speaker: Azura
intro.line: Watch out, everyone! Xander's retainers just arrived with a team of soldiers.

intro.speaker: Ryoma
intro.line: Hmph. So much for this duel. Cowards. Prepare to engage the enemy!

intro.speaker: Laslow
intro.line: None of you fiends will get within shouting distance of Lord Xander.

intro.speaker: Peri
intro.line: Yeah! At least, not in one piece. Heehee!

intro.speaker: Xander
intro.line: Blast! This isn't what I wanted...

boss.speaker: Laslow
boss.line: My duty is to protect Lord Xander and the kingdom of Nohr, in that order. May the gods have mercy on anyone who stands against me.

boss.speaker: Laslow
boss.line: Haha! *cough* *cough* Sorry, friends... I won't be able to... return with you...

boss.speaker: Peri
boss.line: Are you ready to die? If not, I'll give you 10 seconds to get ready. Time's up!

boss.speaker: Peri
boss.line: I'm sorry I disobeyed you, Lord Xander. So this is what death feels like...

boss.speaker: Xander
boss.line: Stay back! This is between me and Corrin.

boss.speaker: Xander
boss.line: It wasn't supposed to be this way...

boss.speaker: Xander
boss.line: Fight without fear or hesitation. Don't hold back — I promise you that I won't.

boss.speaker: Corrin
boss.line: I won't. I know I've never bested you before, but that changes now!

boss.speaker: Xander
boss.line: That's the spirit. Come at me!

boss.speaker: Xander
boss.line: I knew you could do it. I'm proud of you, Corrin. I always told you...you could do anything...you set your mind to...

boss.speaker: Xander
boss.line: Your technique was flawless... You finally stopped holding yourself back. It's what I've always tried to teach you. You're becoming the leader I always knew you could be...

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: You've done well, Corrin...

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: N-no... I'm still so weak. I'm still no match for you... Why did you let me win, Xander? TELL ME! WHY?!

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Answer me! I fought so hard to be stronger... But it's still not enough! You still... *sob* Ended up protecting me in the end... It's just like when we always trained together... It's just like... *sob*

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: Dry those eyes, little prince/princess. Do you know what my favorite memory is? Sharing a laugh with you, Elise, Camilla, and Leo around the dinner table. I think Leo had his boots on the wrong feet that day... In my heart I have so many memories of us siblings laughing together... Those were the happiest days of my life.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Then why did it have to end this way? Why did we have to fight?! If you had just listened to Elise, or to me... Neither of you would have had to die!

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: You can't throw your life away on "if only," little prince/princess. You chose a path... but I never had that choice. I am the Crown Prince of Nohr. My fate was sealed the day I was born.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Xander...

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: I'd like to think that things could have turned out differently in another world. We could have ended the war together, fighting side by side. *cough* *cough*

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Xander! Stay with me!

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: I'm here, Corrin. I...I'm sorry...I let you slip away from me. As crown prince... I didn't have the option of picking sides like you or Leo or the rest. So, I really did intend to kill you for the good of Nohr. But in the end... I did what I always told you not to do. I let my feelings overrule my duty. In the end, it was my undoing. Is that...is that justice?

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: That's not fair, Xander! You think you can just say something like that and die on me? I'll never be as good as you, Xander... I see that now. I've always looked up to you... You can't leave me!

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: You have already prevailed, little prince/princess. Don't you see? I couldn't lead this world...or Nohr...into peace. But you...you can. And you will. You can do the things I couldn't. That's how you'll surpass me... In the end...

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Xander...

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: I'm counting on you, Corrin... Father... Garon...he's...he's... *cough* *cough* He's not what he used to be...

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Xander... I think I understand. I promise to stop him!

end.speaker: Xander
end.line: Thank you, Corrin. Now, it's time...to say good-bye... Please...don't cry...

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: No... Xander? XANDER! *sob*

end.speaker: Azura
end.line: Corrin...

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: ... I...I suppose we have to keep going. It's what they would have wanted. If I stayed here crying, Xander would have g-gently scolded me... To honor their sacrifices, I must carry on their honorable legacy. I must be a light in the dark, just like Elise was... And I must be a kind and determined leader... *sob* Just like Xander. If we can't stop King Garon, then all this death will have been in vain... Come on, everyone. It's time.

end.speaker: Azura
end.line: You can do this, Corrin.

end.speaker: Corrin
end.line: Thank you, Azura. Everyone...we're almost at the end. King Garon awaits. Xander... Elise... I hope you both know how much I love you. I promise to make you proud...and to end this senseless war for good!
